scripts.start: npm run metro:cleanport && sh -c 'set -a; [ -f ./.env ] && . ./.env; set +a; npx react-native start --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8081 --reset-cache'
scripts.android: npm run android:wifi && npm run metro:cleanport && (sh -c 'set -a; [ -f ./.env ] && . ./.env; set +a; npx react-native start --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8081 --reset-cache' >/tmp/constellation-metro.log 2>&1 &) && sleep 4 && npm run android:install && npm run android:launch && npm run android:logs
scripts.dev-client: npm run metro:cleanport && sh -c 'set -a; [ -f ./.env ] && . ./.env; set +a; npx react-native start --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8081 --reset-cache'
scripts.android:launch: adb reverse tcp:8081 tcp:8081 && adb shell am start -n com.constellation.app/.MainActivity
scripts.android:metro: npm run metro:cleanport && sh -c 'set -a; [ -f ./.env ] && . ./.env; set +a; npx react-native start --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8081 --reset-cache'
scripts.metro:cleanport: sh -c 'pkill -f "react-native start" 2>/dev/null; sleep 1; pids=$(lsof -ti tcp:8081); if [ -n "$pids" ]; then kill -9 $pids 2>/dev/null; fi; true'
